(Simplified: 枨)
Chinese Definition:
①用東西觸動：棖觸(ａ．觸動；b．感動)。
②古代門兩旁所豎的長木柱，用以防止車過觸門。

棖字的基本解释

棖
chéng
见“枨”。

棖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》直庚切，平庚，澄。］
“枨1”的繁体字。
(1)古代门两旁竖的木柱。
(2)借指门。
(3)支柱。
(4)木棒。
(5)触动。
(6)传说中取人内脏的恶鬼。亦称“棖棖”。
(7)果名。即橙。

棖字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棖； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页532第17
【唐韻】直耕切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】除耕切，?音橙。【說文】棖，法也。【揚子方言註】救傾之法，門楔也。【爾雅·釋宮】棖謂之楔。【禮·玉藻】君入門，介拂闑，大夫中棖與闑之閒，士介拂棖。【註】棖，門兩旁長木。闑，門中央所豎短木。　又【方言】棖，隨也。【註】棖柱令相隨也。　又【說文】杖也。【謝靈運·祭古塚文】以物棖撥之，應手灰滅。　又果名。卽橙也。【金城記】欲以棖子臣櫻桃，但恨不同時耳。　又【唐韻古音】直良切，音長。【詩·鄭風】俟我乎堂兮。【箋】堂當作棖。又孔子弟子申棖。

doorpost
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chéng］
["Guangyun" straight Geng cut, Ping Geng, Cheng. ]
Traditional characters for "枨1".
(1) The wooden pillars on both sides of the ancient door.
(2) By referring to the door.
(3) Pillars.
(4) Wooden sticks.
(5) Touch.
(6) The evil spirits that take people's entrails in the legend. Also known as "枨枨".
(7) Fruit name. That is orange.
doorpost
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枨; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 532 17
[Tang Yun] Direct plowing and cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] In addition to plowing and cutting, the sound is orange. [Said the text] 枨, the law also. [Annotation in Yangtze Dialect] The method of salvation is the door wedge. 【Erya·Shigong】It is called the wedge. 【Rite·Yuzao】Introduction to Jun, Jie Fu, doctor Zhong Xiao and Jie Zhi Xian, Shi Jie Fu Xiao. [Note] There are long woods on both sides of the door. There is a short wood in the center of the door.　[Dialect] 枨, follow along. [Note] Xi Zhu Ling is also with you.　[Said Wen] Stick also. [Xie Lingyun·Ancient Tomb Writing] If you use things, you should wipe it out.　Fruit name. The orange is also. [Jin Cheng Ji] I want to give you cherries, but I hate it all.　[Tang Yun ancient sound] Naruto good cut, long sound. [Poetry·Zheng Feng] I'm almost dignified. 【Jian】Tang treats it as a shame. And Confucius disciple Shen Xi.
